title: The StreetSmart Story
summary: Max Fosh goes on the streets to test the knowledge of Londoners about their own city.
payoff: The hilarious reactions and answers from the participants as they struggle to answer basic questions about London.
description: In this video, Max Fosh takes to the streets of London to test the knowledge of its residents about their own city. He asks simple questions about famous landmarks, historical events, and basic geography, only to be met with hilarious confusion and incorrect answers. The video highlights the often surprising lack of knowledge people have about the place they call home, leading to amusing interactions and moments of disbelief from both Max and the participants.
